load.comment: NIL  Exit load if charged, by NIMF to the unit  holders shall be credited to the scheme immediately net of Goods &  Service Tax, if any

value.main_scheme_name: Nippon India BSE Sensex Next 30 Index Fund
value.scheme_objective: The investment objective of the scheme is to provide investment returns that commensurate to the total returns  of the securities as represented by the BSE Sensex Next 30 Index before expenses, subject to tracking errors.  However, there is no assurance that the investment objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
value.suitable_for_investors: *: • Long Term Capital Growth • Investments in equity and equity related securities and portfolio replicating the composition of the BSE Sensex Next 30 Index, subject to tracking errors *
value.type_of_scheme: An open-ended scheme replicating/tracking BSE Sensex Next 30 Index
